text: Clyde Best (born 24 February 1951) is a former football player. He has played for Bermuda national team. He was awarded an Order of the British Empire. == Biography == When Clyde Best was 16, he moved from Bermuda to England. He played for West Ham United F.C. Best made his first goal on 3 September 1969. He had 218 games and 58 goals with West Ham. Then he played in the Dutch Eredivisie for the Feyenoord. Lated he joined some American teams (Tampa Bay Rowdies, Toronto Blizzard and Portland Timbers). == References == Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Bermudian footballers Category:British footballers
